Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good Printer At A Good Price
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Efficient; Good Footprint; Quality Construction
Cons: Difficult To Set Up
A Good All in One Printer at a reasonable price. A good footprint size for a work desk. Found it difficult to setup using a network.
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Reliable; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Fast Operation
Cons: Noisy; Hard Setup
good printer for the price. It's a little noisy and was kind of hard to set up-I had to call for 800 number help. They were helpful and solved my problems,

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I bought this printer/fax/copier/scanner for home office use. I have used all of these functions and this machine has performed flawlessly.The quality of the prints and photo copies has been excellent thus far. I am a non-techy type user, but the setup was a breeze. My only criticism of this machine is the flimsy paper loading tray. It seems like it could be made from a sturdier plastic and sometimes it is difficult to load. Aside from that small flaw, it is a great 4 in 1 printer for the price.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Replaced my broken HP Photosmart printer.
Item.Review:
Pros: Speed, price, setup.
Cons: nothing so far.
My HP Photosmart printer stopped printing after 1.5 years. I decided to try a different mfr since the HP printers seemed to have a bad track record (from what I read on the web). I decided to give this Epson a try. I liked the price, speed, the document feed feature. My wife is a teacher and she does a lot of copying. After a month and a half of using it, I have no complaints. It was easier to setup on my wireless network than my HP was. Very easy to use. The black ink already ran out after a month but we do use it quite a bit. The color ink cartridges seem to have a lot of life left. I bought an extra capacity black ink so we'll see how it goes. I would definitely recommend this printer. One feature that would've been nice to ... have with this printer is the ability to print 2 sides. I'm sure another more pricey model has that feature though. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
My very first printer was an Epson. When I finally had to replace the printer, I purchased another Epson. I didn't think twice before I bought the next printer. This printer is for the office. It has everything that was needed even a great price at Staples. I am an Epson fan.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Best value in an all-in-one printer.
Item.Review: Suprised by the printing speed and quality for this value all-in-one printer. Easy setup, and no problems with the Wi-Fi connection. These are all features not found in my previous Canon all-in-one.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Great all in one. Prints fast, good and economical on ink, very good quality photos and text, scans and copies well, prints right from card reader. Has document feeder and big paper tray. So many features for such a great price.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Reliable; Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Easy To Use; Quiet; Easy To Set Up
This printer does it all. It is user friendly and quick. Great purchase for the money. We have had more expensive printers in the past and have been very disappointed. This one will exceed your expectations.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: This is a good printer for me
Item.Review: Having been using it several months since I bought it from BB with a good deal. It's very easy to setup and works perfectly fine. The feature set for the money can't be beat.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Would you beleive that such a low cost printer would do such a great job!!!!!! You should because it does..... Easy to install, easy to operate. The scanner is great and so is the printer. I haven't tried the fax yet
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Very Good Printer for the price
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy set up and awesome pring quality
Cons: you have to open the scan software before scanning
I love it! After a very disappointing all in one printer purchase that lasted less than 2 years, with many problems in that time, I shopped around for a new one and found this. It was very easy to set up, the print quality is great, and I love the fold down control console. The controls are very easy to understand and use. When it comes to scanning to your computer though, you have to open the scan software before you can scan, its really not a big deal but it does add a step to the process. Also the fax process is very easy, and my first fax went through on the first try. Overall the quality of the printer is great, for the price!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I bought this printer to replace another companies printer that I had just bought and couldn't get to work. After spending 4 hours on the phone with them trying to fix the scanner, I returned the printer and got this one. So far it's absolutely fantastic! Scanner set up in less then 15 seconds! Printer setup was really easy too. It has much more features at a better price. I would highly recommend this to anyone.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Mac friends don't let friends print HP!
Item.Review:
Pros: Supported by Epson in OSx 10.8, price, features
Another Mac OS update, and another newish HP all in one not being supported and losing features!
The Epson is very sleek and capable, reasonably priced, well recommended by almost all who use it, has economy inkjet options, and is supported in Mac OSX 10.8!
Wife loves it, and we're not going back to HP; not now, not ever.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I haven't tried all of the features yet but the printing is beautiful. Clear, crisp..very nice. I will say that I was not able to set up the WiFi by myself. Thank goodness my husband is a computer "geek". Then again, I'm "techno challanged". Can't wait to try the other features. Printer is a bit large and had to place it someplace other than my last one but it is really nice. It is a bit loud but not a problem. Purchase price was GREAT!!!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Finally a fax that works!
Cons: It's not in room with laptop; scanning... have to get up.
Easy to use in every way. Fax and scanning are a breeze. Photo printing quality excellent!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality; Easy To Use
Bought this printer because it is compatable with my iphone, ipad. This is not some high end laser jet. It only cost [$] on sale. Easy set up. Really!!!! Prints great for a home owner use.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything..
Cons: Can't Find Anyhting.
Great -Great Printer..! First Off The Ink Last The Longest, I Have Ever Seen On Any Printer..! And It's Not 2 Much To Replace..! Great Printing Quality, From Copys 2 Scanning - And Photos On The Right Paper..!! And 4 The Price.!! Buy It And Run Like The Wind..! A Must Own.. Hope You Enjoy As Much As I.....

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Quiet; Reliable; Fast Operation
Better than my last HP all in one. Fast, easy to use. Only draw back is Espon tech support is not open 24/7. Needed help on wireless set-up for the scanner

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good printer poor paper tray design
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Reliable; Quiet; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up
OVerall a good product. Paper tray design could be better, it would be a plus if it allows paper loading without pulling out the tray.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Compact Design
Cons: Noisy
Had a little trouble with sending fax. Some would go and some would not, but a call to epson fixed the problem 1,2,3 and I was off and running

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Reliable; Compact Design; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality
Gets a lot of home use as copier. Very fast compared to our old HP 4 in 1.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Compact Design; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Reliable
This is my first Epson. I've had only HP printers for many years. So far I'm loving this.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality
Cons: Noisy
I'm not the most technically inclined person, but the printer was a breeze to set up. It is a bit noisy. However the print quality out weighs the little noise that you hear.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Incredible value for an all-in-one printer. Print quality is very good, set up was relatively easy. You can manually duplex print, but the instructions, even on Epson's website, are not very good. When printing a multi page document, select the print option to print all the odd pages first, then flip over and manually put these in the print tray and print all the even pages next. If you plan on doing a lot of duplex printing, I would go with the Epson 645 model - same as this, except it has auto duplex printing. Customer service, shipping, etc. with B&H was excellent.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality
Cons: Noisy; Jams Easily
Have to be careful loading paper. And is quite noisy, but fast! and efficient!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy to Use; Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction
Bought one for home and I was so pleased with it that I bought another for the office. Wireless setup could not have been any easier. Very small footprint. Default setup provides for double-sided printing. Be sure to change that or you get a blank sheet when you try to print.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Clear copies, easy to set-up
Cons: Nothing so far
I have not utilized all of its features, the fax is the only feature that I have not used. It was not hard to set up and the copies that it makes are good, the speed is good, For the price it was a good purchase for my use.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Wireless Set Up; Easy to Use; Efficient; Reliable
Cons: Noisy
Overall I like this unit. I wish I could print 8.5x14, but it was my fault to assume it printed this size.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Reliable
Our home office dedicated fax machine went out. This is a older model (646 supersedes it)with the biggest difference being auto duplexing. Another quibble is it has not capacity to automatically switch between a voice or fax call. It means you have to set the unit to 'auto answer' to receive a fax and then set the ring count lower that your answering device on the line. However,if you do it has no capacity for voice mail so your caller hears a fax machine going off. As this is a lower end machine and on sale at that [$];you cannot expect the feature set of a higher end machine. That said it is very good value. It scans/copies and prints at very good resolution. It is a reasonably quick machine and the price of ink is relatively ... inexpensive. All around it is a reliable machine and the wireless connectivity is easy to set up and works smoothly. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy to Use; Reliable
I have been very impressed with this Epson printer. Print quality is excellent and scanning to an external memory device (SD card or USB drive) is very easy.
Setup of wireless printing took a couple attempts, but this has been the case with other printers as well. Once it was installed printing via wireless connection has been perfect.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Easy to Use
Cons: Inconvenient paper tray
Do not like paper tray at all. Great that it holds 1/2 ream of paper. Not so great when you want to print an envelope. Have to remove all paper, then re-adjust guides to size of envelope. Guides are very hard to adjust in my opinion. Then re-adjust guides to paper again. Not such a good idea. Need to have access to an envelope tray like some other printers have to avoid having to remove and replace paper to print envelopes.Would recommend to friends for general use. Would not recommend if printing a lot af pages and envelopes. Too much stress.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy setup and great on wi-fi
Item.Review: With the difficulties I experienced trying to set up my previous printer on my wireless network, from a different manufacturer, I was a little hesitant to go through the headaches. However, setting up the Epson Workforce 545 onto my network wirelessly was accomplished in about 15-20 minutes. It was easy to setup and has been working flawlessly for about a month from all three of our laptops. I downloaded and installed the free Epson iPrint app from the iTunes store and have print capability from all of our iPhones and my kid's iPod Touch. On my Asus Android tablet, I installed PrinterShare and it works quiet well with this printer. The Epson iPrint remotely shows the ink cartridge levels, allowing me to stay ontop of the ink levels. I cannot speak for the printer's fax capability as I ha ... ve not used it but copying and scanning appears to be okay. If I had one complaint, the software/drivers that comes in the included CD was outdated and downloading and installing the updated software took the longest time during the install process. I had to do this for all three of my laptops and it became irritating. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Epson WorkForce 545 so far very good
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Efficient; Easy to Use; Quality Construction
Cons: None
Easy to install and setup, worked well with Windows 7. I like to reserve judgment until I have used a product extensively, however, so far very good.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Got an iPAD2? Then you NEED THIS!
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Reliable; Easy To Set Up
What a great printer for this price, AND it is wireless! The hardest part of installation was finding the password for my router! EASY set-up! Prints great on glossy paper, not so great on Matte

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: If I could give this a "zero star" I would.
Item.Review:
Pros: It has Airprint capabilities; It is wireless...sometimes
Cons: Does not print lebigbly with "draft" quality; high ink consumption
I have had this printer for just over a month now. I purchased this printer because it seemed like it was a good deal. Knowing what I know now, I would have paid a little extra money to get a much better printer. I strongly advise against this printer. Here are some cons that I have run into so far:
1. The printer does not pick up a wireless signal from my router unless the router is sitting on top of the scanner. I had it sitting ~ 2 feet away on a table, and it would not pick up the signal.
2. I usually like to print things in the "draft" quality because it saves money with ink and it's much faster. I had an hp photosmart prin ... ter (C4180 model) before this one, and the draft quality for standard documents was just as good as the normal quality. However, with this printer, I could barely read the draft quality; therefore, I am having to waste A LOT of ink. In fact, the "fast draft" option for my hp printer is 100 times better than the draft option for this printer. If my hp printer were wireless I would throw this one out and just keep using that one.
3. The 126 cartridge claims it will print 385 pages with black ink. I have no idea where they got this from, because I have printed approximately 200 pages (or less) in a month, and I just had to switch out my black ink. Basically, I'm not even half way through a ream of paper yet since I've had this printer. This problem wouldn't be as much of an issue if the draft quality was legible. The black ink cartridge with my hp printer would last for months. I could usually get through close to two reams of paper (almost 1,000 pages) with my hp printer.
4. The printer interrupts it's current print job to make you replace an ink cartridge. I usually try to use every bit of ink I can since all printers are notorious for giving you the low ink warning, when in reality you have plenty of ink to last you for a while longer. I had the low ink sign for only a few days, and although the last page it printed was not the least bit ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Took it out of the box and in less than 25 minutes I had 2 Macs and a Toshiba laptop printing wirelessly with no problems. I haven't printed any photos with it yet, but all of the documents that I've printed and copied so far have all been laser quality. If you are looking for a powerful all-in-one at a bargain price, the Workforce 545 is perfect!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Easy to Use; Efficient; Reliable; Compact; Easy To Set Up
This is my third Epson printer. I like that you can purchase one color of ink at a time. The ink goes a long way. One complaint: All colors of ink must be full in order to use just black ink.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Looks awesome& holds lots of paper - that's it!
Cons: POOR print quality, slow speed, terrible wireless concept
This is the first time Epson let me down - completely in this case! I bought this printer for the wireless features and the ability to print from my smartphone. There are several issues users need to be aware of: 1. If you are using a Mac with Lion OS, you will need to download all the software from Epson or Apple - you cannot use the CD! 2. If you have a smartphone other than an iPhone, you can still use the wireless feature, but only if you e-mail your information to the printer - no sending directly to your printer. This is so round about it isn't funny. 3. If you want to print photos - good luck! I aligned the heads, cleaned the heads, and all ... 15 pages I printed were banded...not little blemishes I could live with, HUGE bands of faded blaaaa. I even deleted and reinstalled the software, aligned and cleaned the heads again, and still blaaaa. 4. Text was just as bad as the photos 5. The speed was ok at best - don't let the Epson Cheetah fast commercial fool you - the print speeds shown on the advertisements are NOT what you will be getting! I'm not certain what the PC version of the software looks like, but the Mac version includes the ability for fast print (sacrificing some quality) and slow print. Slow is horribly slow, and fast is nowhere near what is advertised. The poor print quality was present on fast and slow print speeds. 6. Setting up the printer was pretty tedious since I had to set up an e-mail address for the printer to use with my smartphone. 7. And I really hated that the software is piece milled. You need to install ABBY, Adobe, print driver, scanning software, ink level monitoring software, and everything piece by piece - not fun by any means.
The best part about this printer was I purchased it at Best Buy and they took it back from me with no questions asked, refunded my purchase to my Rewards card, and even refunded the Rewards points I spent on this product. I might try Epson one more time, but will try a higher end model such as the 845 and ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use
Cons: Flimsy Construction
Impressive color printing. It's almost fast. The construction is flimsy, but welcome to the United States of planned obsolescence. I'm optimistic that if I take good care of it, it will last a long time. It's excellent for the price.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Easy to Use
I did some research on some printers before I went out to buy one. I knew that I was going to get this one, but did not know what to expect, even though I read the reviews. It turns out the reviews were right and this printer was a get deal. Great for network use, everyday printing, and FAST.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: It very well meets my expectations. The black ink is running out faster than I thought it would even with Draft Quality Gray Scale printing. The thing I DO like about it is that it asks whether or not I want to use a combination of colors that would mimic Black until I get a new cartridge. Since the ink warning of law, I have printed several times and it has givin me the option to use a combination from the color cartridges to substitute for black. So I don't know how long it does this, but i"m glad because ink is so expensive. I love the fact you can SCAN a pdf copy of your image to USB and it sets up very quickly to the wiireless network even on my Apple computer. this is a good buy. I would love to get another epson that would allow legal size printing and double sided printing.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
Cons: Hard To Use
The printer is fine, exspecially for the cost. The fax function needs a remote operation. You have to go to the fax and press several buttons to recieve it. Not the best for business. Probably a great home printer.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Many features for its cost.
Cons: Print speed
Our first use of this printer was to send a FAX to secure a hotel reservation. Took us two tries to get it right (our error) but it worked beautifully. Features are great. Print speed is same as or slightly slower than the printer it replaced, but adequate for our needs. I wouldn't want to make 200 copies of anything! We've only used it for 3 weeks, so aren't able to report on all of its features or ink consumption.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Easy to Use
Cons: Loud
Got a GREAT DEAL on this printer and am very happy. It is very noisey, but in a house with three kids the noise fits right in. Prints very fast and I love that it automatically asks if I want one side or two sided documents....saves me paper!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: easy set-up, so far so good
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Efficient
I had this set up and running within an hour after following the included step-by-step instructions. I am a Windows 7 user. (I didn't set up the wireless yet, just the cable hookup.) All the features worked easily and the print quality is excellent. Very fast too! I also looked up the price for refill cartridges on [@] and they looked very reasonable. Paid [$] after a 15% off coupon which I got from Geocoupons. Can't believe I got this powerful tool for that price.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Noisy
Love the machine. Great printing, scanning, copying and faxing. Hate the cheaply made paper tray, and the lack of an easy envelope/small sheet feeder. Still recommend it highly.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Quiet; Easy To Use
Cons: Large Footprint
Had it for a short time. Using it with a PC, (USB cable) and a Laptop, (Wireless). Prints, copies. scans, works with photos, both wirelessly and with USB cable flawlessly. Have not had occaision to use the Fax option. Can only hope it works as well as the other functions.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good all in one machine for the money
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Reliable; Easy To Use
Cons: Noisy
I would recommend this machine for purchase. It is one to meet our needs in the office with three users. The price was right and the quality is very good.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Jams Easily; No Wireless Scanning
Ok printer. Moved from a HP OfficeJet and really missing the wireless scanning functionality. Why a printer has wifi, but requires you to connect via ubs to scan to PC baffles me.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Many Error Messages; Hard Setup; Flimsy Construction
This is my first Epson printer and it will be my last. I keep getting error messages. It was very ard to get it set up as wifi and got it after 3 days. I will go back to HP.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Reliable
Love this printer. Much better than the HP4500 I had that was very tempormental and didn't have the option to reduce or enlarge. I love that I can reduce or enlarge with this Epson printer. I like the access to the ink too. Much easier to change than HP. I'm going to consider Epson again when I need a new printer.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I really like it. It was easy to set up. The directions were clear. I am very satisfied with the print quality. I have a problem getting the scanner to communicate with the computer, although it scans perfectly onto a memory stick. The yellow printing on the test pattern is very hard to see. Maybe you can dream up a better test pattern.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: After printing some documents I can say this printer prints fast. The print is clear and bold and crisp. I like being able to print from my tablet on the go with cloud print. I also like the paper feed tray being almost entirely enclosed making sure dust doesn't settle on the paper. Not that much dust will settle being a family of six that use a printer a lot. This baby will definitely be a workforce for our house.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Reliable; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Low Ink Consumption
The lid broke on the Lexmark All-in-One in my shop office. Had an older version (520) at home and like it. Got the 545 for work, with extended warrenty (not only one is shop)

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I use the 545 to print from my iMac, iPad and iPhone. Also it is used by my wife with her Mac Pro. The wireless setup was a breeze on all devices. The printer, scanner and fax functions all perform as expected.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Noisy; Slow Operation
I had hoped for more. After less than a week, it smeared ink, the heads needed to cleaned (lines on printing). Its slow, noisy and if you want to print one envelope changing the paper tray is very time consuming.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good Price for High Quality Printer
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Fast Operation; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Reliable
Cons: Noisy
This printer is best printer I have ever owned. I didn't have to do a print alignment. The ink dries fast. You can scan paper on it and turn it into a picture on the computer. It prints fast. The paper has a tray to go into where it doesn't stay out in the open hanging on. There is an SD slot and usb slot on the printer. It works with mac and pc. The inks are small and affordable. I have yet to try the fax on it though, but this printer has done everything I asked for! I use the usb cord to print, not the wifi. Wish it came with a usb cord, but its ok I got mines off of my old printer. Oh did I mention, this printer has sections in the paper tray to put various types of paper in it li ... ke printer paper? This printer still amazes me...I have more to learn about it. I had it for like 2 weeks by the way. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Does what I need it to do.
Item.Review: This printer is doing what I need it to do. The reviews I read were correct on these issues... 1)It doesn't do well with thicker papers, but I was able to print index cards by loading only 5-10 at a time. 2)It requires a USB cable to set up, which is not included. All other setup was easy. 3)The paper try is not the greatest, but it is working so far. 4)I had some frustrations with the first scan attempt, but I worked them out. 5)The economy printing isn't very clear and I wouldn't use it for anything remotely important, but it is legible. 6)This is my first wireless printer and I love that.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
Prior Epson 420 printer held fewer sheets in the paper feeder; like the bigger capacity of this machine. Note when scanning, even though you selected creating a .pdf document, it is stored in Mac's Pictures folder like scanned .jpegs

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
An absolute breeze to set up with my iPad. And the always fantastic Epson print quality. Great combo printer!!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good printer that does all I want.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easiest setup I ever had with a printer.
Set this up in 10 minutes without reading the directions. Prints great in the modes I'm using. Haven't tried draft (hear that's not so good). Did copy of photo and came out great.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Quiet; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Reliable
Was easy to set up. Prints fast. High Quality printing. does it all and receives faxes automatically. Large paper tray and auto feed tray.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: The Best Printer I Have Ever Owned!
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Reliable; Easy To Use
I initially purchased an HP brand printer because I recognized the name and therefore thought that it would be the best purchase. Was I ever wrong. . .it worked for one week and then the print head went out. I called HP to get a new printhead because I had only printed a couple of times but they gave me the run around. It wasn't until the wonderful people at Staples persued HP that my money was returned for the printer--8 months after I purchased it. This time I did a little more research to find the best printer for my printing needs. I also researched the manufacturers customer service record! With the additional help of a Staples salesperson, I decided on the Epson Workforce 545. I ... t took very little time and effort to set the printer up. The print quality and speed exceeds my expectations. It is also so easy and quick to make changes to the settings. Also the paper tray holds more paper than any printer I have every owned. I also like that the color cartridges are separate so, all I have to do is replace them one color at a time. I am extremely pleased with my new Epson printer purchase. This is definitely the printer to buy! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Quiet; Easy To Set Up
After using HP printers and having nothing but trouble, decided to try EPSON. So far, so good! It's definitely better, faster and quieter than the HP. Hope it lasts.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality; Fast Operation; Quiet; Easy To Use
I bought this printer to use in my home office. I use it for personal printing, as well as for my business documents. It does everything I need it to do, and is so easy to use. I'm really pleased with this purchase.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Sooo cool... Easy to set-up everything, wireless network, ink cartridge installment! Very fast printer for both colored and black n white even for photo printing! Simple and straight to the point LCD screen options. Easy connect printing from a smartphone. Overall, satisfied with this product specially got it on sale! Finally I got the printer I've been longing to have coz of the great specs and work! =)

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Easy to get working thought the USB inputs were hard to find. Without the CD I may never have found them. No reference to them in the printed instructions. Nonetheless, the machine prints well and is easy to use. After a few days, no problems.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Reliable
A very capable printer, good paper capacity, 5 choices of print quality, good speed, and great scanning. The software install allows choices and does not over-install, as is my experience with HP inkjets the past few years. I've recommended this printer to others and helped set up 4 in the past six months. The ability to easily print from an Ipad made one user's day.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Fast Operation; Quiet
Only had this printer for three weeks, but been using the fool out of it. To date, been the best printer I've owned. Have it networked to 7 household pc's. I love it!!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Had it up and running in about 15mins on a wireless network without any problems at all. Prints quickly and quietly with high quality. Also has reasonably price replacement ink cartridges.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Owned a Lexmark....Hated it! Read up on this printer & it got great reviews.... Well worth every cent. Highly recommend!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Reviewer: Needed to replace my home printer badly
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Quiet; Reliable
The printer was easy enough to set up. One needs to have all their account info (WiFi) ahead of time or you could get stuck at that point. Set-up was a breeze and the printer / copier functions work well. I use it primarily at home.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Prints and scans from my Ipad and Iphone
Cons: Nothing yet
Printer is easy to set up and prints to my computer, my ipad and my iphone. Print quality is excellent and I can also scan to all three of my devices. Epson makes it easy to be a couch potato.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Great Print Quality
this was very easy to setup and worked right from the start. have setup 2 laptops with no difficulty. was going to buy a laser but am glad i got this as i like having the option for color. prints just as fast as my old office laserjet

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: So far, so much, much, much better
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Just uses ink fast
Easy set up, wireless is a cinch and I'm beyond pleased with that. My last printer was a royal pain to use on my wireless network...this Epson is the way to go for using on Apple Extreme network with IMacs, MacBooks, everything on the WAN can access instantly...scanning, printing, copying easily done. Thanks Epson, good job! HP could learn a thing or two from this printer.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Easy to set up and use. Mainly purchased for wireless use, and the convenience is great. It is used mostly for documents and shopping coupons. So far it is fast and efficient with all my wireless devices and pc. operating accurately. So far there are no negatives except maybe the paper feeder, but that my be because it wasn't loaded properly. Overall extremely pleased.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: prints great pictures and colored documents
Cons: nothing i have noticed
We had a workforce 600 for 3 years that finally went bad, wanted another one but no longer available so we tried a different workforce, it was way too big for our needs so we returned it for this one. This is perfect! same size as the 600 was, prints great photos and quickly. uses individual ink cartridges but they are decently priced and seem to last a long time. I have been printing pics like crazy since we got it months ago and not even a warning that ink is low! Very happy with this printer!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Really fast; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Good print quality
Cons: Noisy
This printer is SO fast. I'm amazed. It is loud but not enough to be annoying.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: wifi, ink is inexpensive
Cons: had to wait a week cause no best buy in reno had one
mother in-law she loves the one i purchased for my sister! customer service is great! Looking to buy a IPAD for my

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Noisy
This is a great printer. My iPad and MacBook found the printer (and vice versa) with no problem. Set up took no time at all. I didn't have to download anything like others have talked about.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I can print from my iPads!
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality
After my Canon broke after only 2 years, I was looking again at Epson which I always had good luck with. But I needed something that I could print from my iPads, Macs and a couple awful Windows machines. I bought the Epson Workforce 545 from Staples. It was on sale at another office supply store, but they were sold out. So down the street to Staples I went and they price matched the sale from the other store.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy to Use; Efficient; Easy To Set Up
I/ve printed and copied so far. I have yet to try out the fax, but if it works as well as everything else, I am satisfied. Photo printing is more than satisfactory.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: After buying this supposed "Business All-in-one" It will only print on 20lb bond paper. Printing on 20lb 3 hole punch is not supported. Printing on invitation stock is not suppored. Printing on card stock of any kind is not supported. Tech support for this company is absolutely atrocious. Stay away from this product.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Unreliable; Hard To Use; Inefficient; Difficult To Set Up; Flimsy Construction
After buying this supposed "Business All-in-one" It will only print on 20lb bond paper. Printing on 20lb 3 hole punch is not supported. Printing on invitation stock is not suppored. Printing on card stock of any kind is not supported. Tech support for this company is absolutely atrocious. Stay away from this product.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Printing and speed
Cons: Set up and cheap body plastic
Printing is great. Set up to use cable was horrible 5 hour job that ended in failure. Wireless set up was a snap. Body of printer is of lower quality plastic which surprised me, paper tray would be easy to break, but printing features are really excellent and so is speed. Long lasting ink, too. Best Buy has 20% off for ink on Wednesdays which is a great deal. Over all I think it's a great buy.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: everything so far
Cons: nothing so far
I bought this printer to finally replace an old epson cx4800, though nothing was technically wrong with it yet (although I did have to help it feed the paper sometimes, but that's it - and it's old remember#, actually I still have it put away as a solid back up.
But the WF 545... What a unit! Yes! It prints WAY FAST! It blew mw away! My folks just got a new gee-whiz do it all hp printer with all the bells and whistles #that they'll NEVER use#, and everytime they fire it up it takes like 5 minutes to warm up 1st! My 545 prints stuff right now! And QUICKLY! The print quality is phenomonal! Text/picture and photo!
I bought this because of MUCH research I did 1st to see about "at home" refill kits #such as the one I've be ... en using with my cx 4800 for well over a year now#, it is IMPARATIVE to me to find a refillable cartridge #non oem# that will have a resettable chip that "fools" the epson printer. That's what I have in my old epson and it works great! Problem is that I had to wait an extra year for those companies to catch up and be capable of making a "new epson 9 pin style chip" #again, my old one uses the 7 pin style#. So I had to wait to get a newer printer. I love the epson quality and ease of use.
The set up basically took care of itself. The wireless connection and all. All I really had to do was keep clicking next. Pitty for the "CRAPPLE" users who have had issues with this unit... they set up with windows as smooth as silk! I also really dig the printing from my android phone. Just make it an e-mail #attachments - text... whatever#, and send it to the e-mail address assigned to my printer #which is in my phone contacts#, and presto! A picture I took and sent 25 miles away from home was printed and waiting for me when I walked in the door! Needless to say, I'm VERY stoked about this printer.
I'm just waiting for my new WF 545 compattible/refillable cartridges to show up. Because as any epson user know... them inks ain't cheap!! That's why I did VERY detaile ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction; Reliable; Efficient
Read the reviews before I bought. This was one with zero neg reviews. And they were right, easy to set up and easy to use. Love that the paper tray slides up into it. Can scan multiple sheets of paper . Love it

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Efficient
I bought this wireless printer so I could print coupons from my iPhone and iPad. However, after my purchase, I realized that the coupon sites currently recognize only HP wireless printers. I am holding out hope that they soon allow other printers. I have no complaints on the printer. It prints quickly and clearly, in both black and color. Would definitely recommend to others.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Efficient
Cons: Flimsy Construction
The tray that hold the paper is flimsy and somewhat difficult to load.
For the money it will do the job but the quality of the printing jobs was just OK.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: A must have Multifunction AIO Printer
Item.Review: Very easy to set up. Very good wireless copier, printer. Ink is much cheaper than our previous printer. Easy to install! This all-in-one printer does everything... copy, print, scan, fax. I like the "wireless printing" feature where we can print from our laptop, android. I highly recommend this printer.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Easy Wireless Network; Efficient; Easy To Set Up
Cons: It was not Free LOL
Have had many printers that have cost twice as much that only half worked. Was easy to set up and links all our computers to it making things so much easier to print everything. I have already recommended it to friends.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Product! Especially for the Price!
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Efficient; Easy To Set Up
This printer has AWESOME features that I didnt even know about until setting up! Would definitely recommend to anyone as it was a breeze to set up!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use
Cons: Flimsy Construction
ADF works very well, easy to use, economical to buy. Paper output tray flimsy. Unreliable Bluetooth connection. VG print quality.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Efficient; Reliable; Quality Construction
The Epson Workforce 545 printer is great. Its been easy to use, set up, and the quality and speed of print is excellent!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast delivery; Efficient; Cartridges easy to instal; Great sale price; Stylish; Reliable; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction
Cons: Noisy
Staples always provides great service and great prices. My HP 2175v had an ink cartridge get jammed and when I tried to remove it, a little plastic part broke off, so my search for a new printer began. The tech at staples was most helpful and informative. I decided on the Epson 545 because of the reviews, price, and modes. So far it appears to be a great printer for a great price.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Reliable, fast, easy, simple to use
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy to Use; Quality Construction
Replaced a temperamental (other brand) that just wouldn't play well with Windows 7. The (other brand) also had paper feed issues. The Epsom installed easily and has had no glitches whatsoever. Faster too. Great value for the money.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Epson continues to impress with quality
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Reliable; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Fast Operation; Easy To Set Up
At the office, we had a 1280 which worked well for 9 years, expiring earlier in 2012. I purchased a Workforce 1100 and was immediately awed by the speed and quality of the documents...can also produce 11 X 17! When our 2 year old all-in-one died at home, I looked for an alternative and was drawn to the Workforce line. Again, I am quite pleased with the mechanism and print results. Light weight, too

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This machine is the best money I've spent. It installed very easily, exactly as the instructions stated. Immediately passed all tests. It is very intuitive to use, and is quite fast. The price was exceptional. I works just the way you expect. Also free delivery next business day!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Would be again in a heart beat
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Reliable; Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up
A little noisy but that overrides any other function this machine does do. Very Very pleased with the ease and operation

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use
So far so good but too early to talk about efficiency or reliability. The set up was great, very easy. Instantly accessible from laptop or Ipad.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy to Use
Cons: Difficult To Set Up
The machine is slow and noisy when printing. It holds a lot of paper for printing. The printing is very good but the machine is noisy. The scanning is very good.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I got a new replacement printer.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up
I bought this printer to replace my last Epson which lasted 8 days before my extended warrantee ran out. The other one was fine til it died.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Reliable
great quality and extremely easy to set up. Really like the auto feed. software included abbyy fine reader is fantastic for conversion of files.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy to use, easy to install
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Reliable; Fast high capacity; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Noisy
Recommended by a friend. Very satisfied. Replaced a competitive printer that was not providing good service.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer around a hundred bucks
Item.Review: Wireless connection was easy - I loaded the drivers initially using a USB cable. Once it loads the software by wire, it's a snap to set up wireless connection to the router on the network. The display is user-friendly - easy to navigate and perform various functions. I have a workForce 845, and the 545 is like its little brother. Both very good buys for all-in-one printers.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use
Everyday printing, photo printing, presentations. Uses less ink than other printers I've had. Prints fast and quiet.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Printer worked great right out of the box. It was easy to set up, and I was up and printing in no time. The printer has many features and I think you have to use them to learn about how to get the most out of the printer. My only issue is connecting to my wireless router. The printer showed offline when I try to print. I connected the printer with a USB cable and it works great. I use the printer for wireless printing with my IPad and IPod touch, and it works great. The issue may be my router or settings, not with the printer itself.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Ink smears on photo paper
Good general use printer. Ink smears on glossy photo paper. Haven't tried scanning yet.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Best printer I've owned to date
Item.Review:
I've had HPs, Lexmarks, Canons, Brothers, another older Epson, even an old Star Micronics 24 pin. This printer beats them all hands down. It was a breeze to set up on all our computers (5 of them in the house - 4 PCs running Windows XP, Windows 7 Starter, and Windows 7 Pro, and one old Mac running OX 10.4), works on WiFi without twiddling, works flawlessly with our 3 iPhones and 1 iPad. Just a dream.
I've not used any photo paper, as I don't print too many mission critical photos, but the one full-page graphic I did print from a photo editor came out so fast, I was sure there was an error. No error, just a great looking page!
I selected this printer (even though I was sorely tempted by an HP that offered auto duplexing) for three reasons - it works with our iDevices, it has a ... paper cartridge rather than a fold out paper tray (just love being able to load 250 sheets and forget about it for a while), and it uses individual ink cartridges. I am so tired of throwing away 15 percent of one color or another when one color runs out! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: One of the BEST printers I EVER purchased!
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of operation, clarity of printing, technological features, and speed
Cons: nothing I can find yet
An EXCELLENT printer that I expect will serve me like a "WORKHORSE" & exceed my expectations.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Got my new printer home today and immediately set it up and put it to work. As always, Epson didn't disapoint. Color is great and the speed is fantastic! Copied a load of spreadsheets with color and everything is perfect. Thanks again Epson!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Reliable; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Durable construction; Fast Print Time; Low Ink Consumption
Set-up was perfect, prints just about out of the box. You'll love it for simple document printing.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Although the WorkForce 545 is engineered for business, it is perfect for home use. The wireless connectivity gives you the freedom to place the printer at a place that is most convenient for you; on top of that, it allows all your devices to access the printer. The best part is the Espon Connect function, which allows you to print anywhere and virtually everywhere! I love the fact that the printer doesn't have to sit next to my desktop at the most awkward spot, and I love that I can print from anywhere around the world.
On the other hand, the set up is extremely easy and moderately quick as long as you follow the Start Guide and the on screen instruction carefully. It took me less than 10 minutes to get the printer up and running, and it took me another 5 minutes to install the most ... up-to-date firmware. Oh and I got everything done wirelessly!
You have the option to set up the printer through a USB connection; however, the WorkForce 545 doesn't come with the USB cable, so it is up to you to spend some money on one or to set up the printer wirelessly.
Aside from the USB cable, the other downside is the length of the power cord. I personally think it is too short, so you have to place it close to an outlet or a surge protector if you have one.
Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Fast Print Time; Reliable; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Large Footprint
Have owned several other printers, but the EPSON has changed my mind.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
So far songood - my family is amazed at the speed,mthe quality, and that one unit takes the place of two! We love it!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: It works!
Cons: Don't know yet.
I have been using this for about two months and it has been a pleasure to use. Compared to my previous Kodak all in one, this has been a relief. The Kodak had all kinds of issues with software updates (which never did work and I had to keep installing with original disk). Kodak continually jammed and had problems with print head. And don't dare use the "clean print head" feature on the Kodak because it will empty your ink cartridges. So far I have had no problems with the Epson.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I found the hookup to be convenient and intuitive. Make sure you know your wireless password (if you're going wireless). It takes just a few minutes to get up and running.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I have use this printer for about a year now and I have had no problems with it. It prints beautiful pictures and documents and a scanned copy looks like the original. I have not used the fax capability because the company I am connected through does not offer this service. It works great with WiFi as well when using my laptop. It's the best printer I have ever owned.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy to set up and use
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up wireless features
Cons: A little slow but good for the price
I am a total novice but needed a wireless printer and this one was easy to set up and use. Has lots of features that make it a good multi-purpose printer.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet
Cons: Slow Operation
I love using the the workforce 545 for printing from my iPad and iPhone! I did purchase the workforce 435 by accident and it does not have AirPrint. Check from the list on apple for compatible printers. Love it!!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Reliable; Fast Operation; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality; Quiet
Have had no problems with printer and it's features are very good for the price.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up
Cons: None
Although it took about 15 minutes to install the software, the program walked you through the process quite smoothly. Print quality looks great for an inkjet versus a laser

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Unreliable; Flimsy Construction; Slow Operation
I AM EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED IN THE QUALITY OF THE PRINTING AND AM SERIOUSLY CONSIDERING RETURNING THIS PRINTER, FLIMSY CONSTRUCTION AND NOT RELIABLE, ALREADY NEEDED TO BE TURNED OFF AND ON IN ORDER TO PRINT A SIMPLE OCUMET.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: i have stop useing this product because it's very
Item.Review:
Pros: nothing
Cons: expensive
i traded my epson work force back in as it was to expensive to operate.i purchased a kodak hero9.1 and use about 1/10th of the ink to operate and the quality is excellent. i used 4 sets of epson of ink to print 85 8x10 pictures . with the kodak hero 9.1 i used only 1and1/2 sets of ink to complete the same # of prints.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use both for printing, copying, faxing and scanning
Cons: Paper tray is a bit awkward
We think this printer is the best bit of tech that we have bought for ages. It is simplicity itself to set up, its print quality is great (it's not a $5000 laser printer), and I love the fact that it has its own e-mail address.
My first one had a problem, and I called Epson on Saturday late afternoon: they sent me a replacement which arrived Wednesday lunchtime.
One thing to note: it's REALLY important that you place it on a completely flat surface: the tolerance for the paper tray sliding in and out is very tight (which is what caused the problem).

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Reliable
Cons: Large Footprint; Noisy
We have just started using this all-in-one printer. So far so good--we're happy!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: OK when it worked
Cons: Jambs
What should have been a great product was a complete failure. It almost always fed 2-4 sheets at a time, causing continual paper jambs. After about 20 events the printer finally sucked in too many sheets and died. Cheap plastic parts did not help. Speaking of help, what help from Epson? Going back to Canon.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Although I've only had this printer a couple of days - I was able to install it easily enough to my home network. However, after having done so, on both my computers I get a message that my computer is unable to map all my network drives (it is looking for Memory Card, Drive "Z". Why this was not part of the iinitial set-up is beyond me - but this is very annoying. I think the paper tray is poorly designed - says it will hold 250 pages - but I think it would probably jam as the part at the end of the paper tray that feeds the paper isn't high enough to hold that much paper.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: It's great for printing wirelessly from home computer and IPhone.
Cons: Not good with heavier photo papers. Paper tray is cheaply made.
This is a really good inexpensive general purpose wifi printer. If you are printing webpages or items where great photo quality is not needed then you will be happy with this printer.
The printer has trouble printing on any of the heavier Epson Photo Papers and jams frequently.
If you plan on printing photos primarily, you may want to look at a different Epson model.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Compact Design
Cons: Flimsy Construction; Noisy; Slow Operation
Can not get scanner to communicate with my PC. Have reloaded software and driver numerous times, sought EPSAON tech support. Still does not work. I have found a work around and be getting a better printer/scanner as soon as I am able.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer but software not so much
Item.Review:
Pros: price was good, prints documents and pictures great
Cons: software harder to use and not as efficient
Easy to set up, both wireless and usb, printer a little slower than our previous and harder to work with, much harder to scan and store pdf files, overall I like the printer but miss the simplicity of last printer

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: this all-in-one printer is giving me a headache. the basic setup was easy, but am having a difficult time setting up the advanced features for other devices and sending and recieving faxes!!!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: 1st Impressions of Epson Workforce 545 All in One
Item.Review:
I have just installed a new Epson Workforce 545 All in One on an old school PC running Windows XP and on a brand new Mac Pro. I also installed Epson iprint apps on my iphone and ipad.
I began the set-up on the Windows computer. Setup was automatic, quick and without any hitches. Within minutes I had the printer working hooked up to our wireless network and working. So far the printing looks to be good quality, and quick.
The setup on my Mac wasn't quite so easy. The CD that came with the printer didn't come with software for Lion or Mountain Lion, so I had to go to the Epson website to download drivers. Unlike the pc installation, I had to download each driver separately and install them separately... one for the printer, one for the fax, one for the scanner, another manag ... ement driver, and one to keep track of the ink settings. I'm fairly new to using a Mac, so I found the driver installation to be way more time consuming and onerous than I think it has to be... maybe its a Mac limitation, but couldn't things be made as simple as the PC installation?
I really like being able to print from all my devices wirelessly...the Epson iprint app installed in seconds on my iphone and ipad, and both are printing perfectly.
I already am a fan of this printer. It is working without any hitches, and the print quality is excellent. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I am over 70 and had no problem installing the printer. Very straight forward. This is my 3rd Epson. I like them the best. I have printed some photos and they turned out great. I will using this printer for a very long time. I would recommend any Epson product to my family and friends.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I have no complaints at this point. The set-up was very simple and no USB cable (which has to be purchased separately) was needed, seeing as we have a wireless router. The print was very fast and this all-in-one is conveniently small. Haven't set-up the fax, so I can not comment on that feature. So far, I am happy about this product, to be continued... i hope :)

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: So far so good. Delightful printer, excellent features, so easy to install that my four year old could do it....actually she did...with a little help from Dad...now she wants to print every sesame street character and put it on the fridge....so we did...thanks Epson .

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Took me about 15 minutes to set everything up. Installation was a breeze, and setting up wireless printing was just a couple taps on the ok button. So far it prints fast and in high quality.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: scans quickly
Cons: paper tray location
My husband uses this printer when he works from home and raves about how great the scanner is, specifically. Printer is a bit slow but makes clear copies. The only "negative" would be that the pull-out paper tray is below the printer so you don't know when you're running low on paper whereas if it was a top feeder, you can easily see how much paper is left.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Quiet; Fast Operation; Reliable
We have only had it for a couple months but very easy to use... We had and HP before and was not my favorite. Really like this one....

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 545 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: good printer, all features nice, but I now have to order ink and am shocked that it's going to cost [$]to just get ink ! I did not print at high volume and the ink lasted around six months, but again, it was very moderately printing. So, I guess I'll be spending at least [$]per year on ink, which I'm not happy about.
